resources.string: Use side panels to keep statistics of players
Click on bottom button of left or right side panel at the main screen to open it
Automatically add players. (Restoring data on long press)
Select active players: click toggle button, choose players from table above and click again to apply
Close panel (also you can tap outside the panel)
Clear panel (shows dialog with two options: delete all players or clear points and fouls)

After adding the players and choice of active players each button on the main screen will be assigned to the relevant player.
 When changing score or foul click on player button to apply the action to the player.
 Substitution active players can be either through the panel, or after long pressing on the button of the player.
 
 * Currently, automatic data recovery players panels not working. So you have to do it manually by long pressing the button automatic adding multiple players.
